channel.title: Need some help
channel.description:
1) how can i add spec bar to any weapon? (i can`t do spec att cause i dont have spec bar in combat)
2) how can i add command ::max to see max hit in any weapon?
3) when im doing a trade with someone, and click "decline" i get "connection lost"
please help me.. with thanks, FrozenLord.

item.title: Need some help
item.dc:creator: @henrik6 henrik6
item.description:
@henrik6 wrote:

u cant add special do all weapons .
if u want command ::max then go to moparscape tutorials.

  1. when im doing a trade with someone, and click “decline”
    i get “connection lost”

This is your server or client problem:)

just change source.

Read full topic
